website_summaries.verdict: Designed for use in the gentle cycle, this detergent has a fantastic scent and is a good option for users who wash a lot of delicate clothing.
pros: This product stands out for its "Sparkling Falls" scent, which leaves clothes smelling fresh out of the laundry and lasts for a long time
Gives a deep clean to delicate clothing even when used on the gentle cycle
Fade-resistant technology brightens whites and restores color over multiple washes
It works in both traditional and high-efficiency machines
cons: While it offers a superior clean on gentle cycles, other detergents may prove more powerful on regular cycles

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive (6) bottles of 75 ounces (a total of 450 oz) as listed. I received ONE bottle.
customer_reviews.author: "tful282"

customer_reviews.title: FALSE/MISLEADING. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Misrepresented. Received 1 bottle rather than 6 AS states in title. False advertising at it's worst. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give me back my money!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to either get my money back or replacement. I cannot return a damaged product that arrived in a box soaked with liquid from a broken bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Verdejo

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Woolite Gentle Cycle Laundry Detergent for a number of years. I really like this product because it gets clothing clean and it is very gentle on all fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Old Faithful
customer_reviews.text: A product I have used for decades. It’s the only detergent worthy of my knit clothes and delicates.
customer_reviews.author: dlp

customer_reviews.title: Love Woolite for more than just woolens!
customer_reviews.text: I have found that washing with woolite allows me to hand-to-dry more clothes than other brands (we only use HE). Save money and wear and tear on the dryer for sure!
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged!
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with this item for washing delicates. Very impressed with how well this was packaged to prevent leaking while enroute.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Good Gentle Soap
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years for my clothes that I want to keep their brightness. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: YoM

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry clean only clothing and everything else.
customer_reviews.text: I wash my dry clean only clothes with woolite and the results are great. I also have sensitive skin and it does not bother my skin. This is the best laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: I've used woolite for years
customer_reviews.text: Does the job required and I don't break out in a rash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for special clothes
customer_reviews.text: If you have clothes that need special care, wool it’s is a great product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: For Delicate Laundry
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for many years on delicate laundry such as sweaters, blouses and undies. It is a gentle with low suds so rinses out well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Scoumperdis

customer_reviews.title: Woolite for all your clothes
customer_reviews.text: This is laundry detergent - which I use all the time so I am well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Don Hart

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Did not perform the job. My clothes did bleed despite claim
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clothes soft
customer_reviews.text: I love woolite for my delicate clothes. Been using this for years . Keeps my clothes bright and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: The advertisement was misleading.
customer_reviews.text: There were three units on the ad and I thought I was getting a great deal. So very wrong. Overpaid and will not use this vendor ever again. For anything.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Item is not new and looks like an old product
customer_reviews.text: Item looks like it is a used product and the label looks worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Emkayoo

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect info in website
customer_reviews.text: Returning item. Info incorrect in website. It says 6 bottles. Got only 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lid was broken upon arrival and soap had leaked out all over inside of packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: The product is good as we all know. The problem was that the cap was damaged in shipment and the soap leaked all over. It's been weeks since it was returned and still waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jerry z

product_meta.title: Woolite Gentle Cycle Liquid Laundry Detergent , Sparkling Falls Scent, 75 Ounce/ 50 loads
product_meta.description: With Woolite Gentle Cycle laundry detergent, you can keep all the clothes you love looking like new for longer. We all have clothes that we want to keep for a long time. It can be disappointing that no matter how carefully clothes are washed in the machine, they still may shrink, stretch, fade, and lose that new fit and feel over time!
feature_bullets: Woolite Gentle Cycle with Color Renew smooths fibers, removes pilling & fuzz, and revives colors
Keeps the clothes you love looking like new even after 30 washes
A caring laundry detergent for all your clothes that doesn’t cause fading, shrinking or stretching
Designed for use in both regular and high-efficiency machines
Ultimate protection for clothes with refreshing Sparkling Falls scent.
